mets:xmlData.dc:subject: Tournament of Roses (1972)
mets:xmlData.dc:description: Two men and a woman look at the designer's rendering of the float "Stairway to the Stars," and the float itself under construction. This is Arcadia's entry in the 1972 Tournament of Roses Parade. The two men are dressed in suits. The woman is wearing pants and what looks like a cardigan sweater.
mets:xmlData.dc:source: Ruth and Charles Gilb Arcadia Historical Museum "Arcadia Chamber of Commerce" Archive Box
